translation.Message_0_Page_0: Well, what can I say... <pause> Everything isn't too bad. There is enough food, there are weapons... True, several wounded, but not much, we have a good doctor. They will be all right. But you go in the district, then everything hectic, especially at the hydropower station, we have to do something about it.
translation.Response_0: It's good that people will heal. but about the hydropower plant...
